name: Location
body:
### Location

A command-line tool for displaying you latitude and longitude coordinates in OS X.

```
$ location
2012-04-03 12:45:47.413 location[60722:700] 37.59273,-122.317349
```

***

_**This is not intended for use by anyone for any purpose.** I just made it as my "Hello, World!" for Objective-C and Mac development. **You've been warned.**_

--britt
tagline: A command-line tool for OS X that outputs your current position (lat,long).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
